data.name: Model Builder: Titan-Forge DLC no. 1
data.detailed_description:
Expand your collection of fantasy figurines with this new free DLC pack!

The Titan-Forge DLC no. 1 brings four new models to the base version of Model Builder, including:
  • Halfling Male Rogue
  • Half-Orc Female Barbarian
  • Human Female Paladin
  • Gnome Male Wizard

Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing four new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

Get building, get creative!

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.
data.about_the_game:
Expand your collection of fantasy figurines with this new free DLC pack!

Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing four new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

data.short_description: Expand your collection of fantasy figurines with this new free DLC pack! The Titan-Forge DLC no. 1 contains four new models, quests, and more painting schemes to create!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit CPU: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD /NVMe strongly recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Modern SSD/NVMe storage recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
